name: places/ChIJZaiaZzFawokRgPdll-cDIUc
adrFormatAddress: 55 Washington St #554, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

originalText.text: Breck did an amazing job with our invitation suite! Everyone raved how timeless the invitations and timeline cards looked. I was also very happy that she was able to incorporate a drawing I did of the estate into the invitation. The process was very easy as Breck links you to a guide book on how to word the invitations and all the potential color options. I will be recommending them to all of my friends who are getting married.

originalText.text: I used Sesame Letterpress for my wedding suite and do not have enough good things to say. Highly recommend!!!! I received endless compliments from our guests!

text.text: I used Sesame Letterpress for my wedding suite and do not have enough good things to say. Highly recommend!!!! I received endless compliments from our guests!

originalText.text: Breck did a fantastic job helping design our wedding invitations that included a custom map of Brooklyn. Her Vintage New York City design collection was the perfect jumping off point to express our vibe and our venue with views of the Statue of Liberty. She patiently worked with us to design a map of Brooklyn that featured custom artwork of landmarks drawn by an artist.  If you want beautiful, classy stationary printed by hand on an antique press, go with Sesame Letterpress & Design. We liked the work so much we immediately ordered matching thank you cards

originalText.text:
I received a gift card for personalized notecards, which I was initially excited about. However, the customization process at Sesame turned out to be a frustrating experience. While the team was eager to help, their willingness to assist was limited within very strict parameters. The process of customizing notecards was far from clear and proved to be quite challenging.

The main issue was the inability to preview a sample on their website. To create examples, you had to work directly with the team. Unfortunately, they were willing to provide only 2-3 samples. Given the wide array of choices, it was incredibly difficult to make decisions based on just 2-3 samples. To make matters worse, I was informed that requesting more samples would come with an additional customization fee, on top of the $175 I had already paid for 50 single-color cards. This left me feeling unsatisfied, especially considering the price point.

In the end, I gave up on the process because the team lacked the patience to allow me to experiment with designs until I found one that I truly loved. I settled for something that I merely liked, which was not the outcome I had hoped for when using the gift card. Unfortunately, the entire experience felt like a waste of money. I would not recommend Sesame for customized notecards.

text.text:

While the team was eager to help, their willingness to assist was limited within very strict parameters. The process of customizing notecards was far from clear and proved to be quite challenging.

Given the wide array of choices, it was incredibly difficult to make decisions based on just 2-3 samples. To make matters worse, I was informed that requesting more samples would come with an additional customization fee, on top of the $175 I had already paid for 50 single-color cards. This left me feeling unsatisfied, especially considering the price point.

In the end, I gave up on the process because the team lacked the patience to allow me to experiment with designs until I found one that I truly loved. originalText.text: We highly recommend Sesame Letterpress for your next event or to treat yourself to beautiful stationary! We came across their work on Pinterest during the beginning of our wedding planning and knew they would be the perfect fit for us. There is no other Letterpress company that compares to their quality, history, value, and beautiful artwork/printing. Breck was an absolute pleasure to work with, she is very organized, her communication and planning is very prompt, and their portal is very straight forward and helpful in creating your own custom invitations with their colors, fonts, and vintage images. They created the most beautiful invitation and timeline card for us that fit exactly to our aesthetic and theme of our wedding. We were so grateful they were able to have our invitations ready and delivered so beautifully with a quick turnaround given a very busy wedding season. We can’t wait to continue to order from them!
